title: Crock Pot Melt-In-Your-Mouth Country Style Steak
directions: Place cubed steaks in crock pot and set on "Low".
Mix together cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup and water in bowl and pour over top of cubed steaks.
Cook for 8-10 hours. Steaks will be so tender, they may fall apart when you take them out.
ingredients: 2 (10 3/4 ounce) cans Campbell's Cream of Mushroom Soup
1 (1 1/4 ounce) packet dry onion soup mix
